meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of insects
meanings.sent1: The tiny, insectan wings shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of insectan creatures buzzing around.
meanings.sent3: The insectan picnic guests brought tiny sandwiches for themselves.
meanings.sent4: Her insectan curiosity led her to explore the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The insectan patterns on the butterfly's wings were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: a member of the class Insecta, comprising insects
meanings.sent1: The insectan scurried across the forest floor, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on various insectan species.
meanings.sent3: The insectan in the garden wore a tiny top hat for the tea party.
meanings.sent4: The insectan was a tiny explorer in a world of giants.
meanings.sent5: The insectan's delicate wings carried it gracefully through the air.
